attributes.action: enshrine in the UK.'s defence policy the Principle of non first use of Nuclear wepons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not to have this policy is to declare to the peoples of the world, that, we, the British, are prepared to start a Nuclear War.  Such a war would bring down such terrible inhuman destruction that it is unthinkable that we should begin one.
